title: Yves: a suggestion
content: Can the website gurus make it a prerequisite to read the FAQ before posting the same questions over and over again. You know some kind of “Yes, I’ve read the FAQ button”. Just a thought.
author: Dan Weaver

comments.content:
I’m not _that_ powerful, so I’ll pass it on to the guys in charge.

_BTW It’s Yves with a Y._ ;-)

Not even on St Yves Day? According to this little French calendar I have, it was yesterday!

hhp

Yeah, my daughter told me! :-) She’s taken up studying the calendar.

Anyway, I’m not particularly interested in saints and we don’t celebrate “name-days” at all in Flanders, so… :-P
Oops sorry about the Y thing. I’m just a sloppy American
